comment.body: could you please add English translation from time to time? Or there is not much point for me to follow you =(
@Netwatcher443: nice. Thanks!
Is this some social network?

"We do record every request you make, so in a week of intensive usage, we can replicate your voice and speech pattern. Wanna call me the police with your voice and say that I've planted a bomb in an arport? Ha-ha, joke."
Yes you can. Threaten his life and he'll think very well))) Personally, I think fast and well when I'm angry. And generating ideas well when I'm tired (but not of videogames))
